ch.usi.inf.lidr.norm
Class MinMax

java.lang.Object
  ch.usi.inf.lidr.norm.LinearScoreNormalization
      ch.usi.inf.lidr.norm.MinMax
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScoreNormalization
public final class MinMax
extends LinearScoreNormalization

The MinMax score normalization algorithm uses the following formula to normalize document scores: s_norm = (s - s_min) / (s_max - s_min), where s_min and s_max are the minimum and maximum scores in the original result list. This way MinMax scales document scores to the range [0, 1], where the minimum normalized score is 0, while the maximum normalized score is 1.

Author:
Ilya Markov
See Also:
"Analyses of multiple evidence combination", Joon Ho Lee. In Proceedings of SIGIR, pages 267-276, 1997.
